title: Fox Campaigns
author: Fox Campaigns
content: 1. Bounty Campaign Starts on: 25 November - 22 December (4 weeks)2. 75,000 QIDEX tokens will be distributed within 1 month after the bounty is over.3. Complete tasks and make reports every week in this thread! 4. Connect with Qidex in social media;- Twitter: https://twitter.com/dex_qi- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100087150605472- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/qidex.site/- Telegram: https://t.me/HovRonQiblockchain- Learn more about Qidex:  https://qidex.site/5. Tokens will be distributed depending on the quality of your work.6. Spammers, cheaters, bots, and similar participants will be banned immediately!7. Follow all the bounty groups/channels to get support and to stay updated;- Bounty Group:  https://t.me/qidex_bounty- Foxcampaigns Group: https://t.me/foxcampaigns- Foxcampaigns Channel: https://t.me/foxannouncementsNote:If you are disqualified for any reason, you will NOT receive any rewards. All rights reserved by Fox Campaigns and the Qidex team. We can make any changes to the campaign rules, if applicable.By joining these campaigns, you're accepting these above terms.Code:Proof of authentication;Telegram username:Campaigns applied:QI wallet address:75,000 QIDEX tokens will be distributed in this campaign. Only participants with quality work(s) will be rewarded;- Signature Campaign: 40%- Twitter Campaign: 30%- Content Campaign: 20% - Reserved: 10%Tokens:-1 - 10 stakes depending on the content quality (video/article).Rules:- Videos must have at least 200 views to qualify.- We accept original videos only with at least 3 minutes.- Only English language is accepted in videos and articles.- Write a good description about Qidex in your video. - Videos with no user's voice will not be accepted.- Attach Qidex links in your video description and articles.- Only YouTube videos will be accepted!- 2 videos and 2 articles per person are allowed.- Articles must have at least 50 views to qualify.- We accept original articles only with at least 500 words.- Submit articles on Medium, Steem, Linkedin, ReadCash.  - Visit qidex.site to learn more about it and write your articles.JOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow Qidex Twitter account: @dex_qi3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 tweets, 5 retweets)5. Twitter accounts will be audited, only those with real followers will be accepted!6. Use these hashtags; #Qidex #NFTMarketplace #NFT #foxcampaigns #qie #qiblockchainJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Twitter Report ]Twitter Profile Link:Week #:Tweet Link #1:Tweet Link #2:Tweet Link #3:Tweet Link #4:Tweet Link #5:Retweet Link #1: Retweet Link #2:Retweet Link #3:Retweet Link #4:Retweet Link #5:Stakes:- Member: 4 stakes per week- Full Member: 8 stakes per week- Senior Member: 12 stakes per week- Hero Member: 16 stakes per week- Legendary Member: 20 stakes per weekRules:- Make a minimum of 10 constructive posts per week- Only English posts will be counted- Posts must be at least 150 characters in length- Spam, Offtopic, Gaming, Bounty reports, and subs are not counted- You MUST wear the avatar and signature- Red trust accounts are not accepted.- Multiple accounts per user are not permittedSIGNATURES:Legendary / Hero
